verses.verse: נִבְחָ֣ר <WH977> [is] rather to be chosen שֵׁ֭ם <WH8034> A [good] name מֵעֹ֣שֶׁר <WH6239> riches רָ֑ב <WH7227> than great מִכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> rather than silver וּ֝מִזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> and gold חֵ֣ן <WH2580> favour טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [and] loving
עָשִׁ֣יר <WH6223> The rich וָרָ֣שׁ <WH7326> and poor נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6298> meet together עֹשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> [is] the maker כֻלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

עָר֤וּם ׀ <WH6175> A prudent רָאָ֣ה <WH7200> [man] foreseeth רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> the evil [וְיִסָּתֵר כ] (וְנִסְתָּ֑ר <WH5641> be absent ק) וּ֝פְתָיִ֗ים <WH6612> himself but the simple עָבְר֥וּ <WH5674> pass on וְֽנֶעֱנָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH6064> and are punished
עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> By עֲ֭נָוָה <WH6038> humility יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> [and] the fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֹ֖שֶׁר <WH6239> [are] riches וְכָב֣וֹד <WH3519> and honour וְחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> and life

צִנִּ֣ים <WH6791> Thorns פַּ֭חִים <WH6341> [and] snares בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> [are] in the way עִקֵּ֑שׁ <WH6141> of the froward שׁוֹמֵ֥ר <WH8104> he that doth keep נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his soul יִרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> shall be far מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

חֲנֹ֣ךְ <WH2596> Train up לַ֭נַּעַר <WH5288> a child עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֣י <WH6310> he should go דַרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> in the way גַּ֥ם <WH1571> Even כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יַ֝זְקִ֗ין <WH2204> and when he is old לֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יָס֥וּר <WH5493> he will not depart מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at

עָ֭שִׁיר <WH6223> The rich בְּרָשִׁ֣ים <WH7326> over the poor יִמְשׁ֑וֹל <WH4910> ruleth וְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> [is] servant לֹ֝וֶ֗ה <WH3867> and the borrower לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he מַלְוֶֽה׃ <WH3867> the lender's

זוֹרֵ֣עַ <WH2232> He that soweth עַ֭וְלָה <WH5766> iniquity [יִקְצֹור־ כ] (יִקְצָר־ <WH7114> will reap אָ֑וֶן <WH7114> shall reap ק) וְשֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> and the rod עֶבְרָת֣וֹ <WH5678> of his anger יִכְלֶֽה׃ <WH3615> shall fail

טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> He that hath a bountiful עַ֭יִן <WH5869> eye ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יְבֹרָ֑ךְ <WH1288> shall be blessed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> for he giveth מִלַּחְמ֣וֹ <WH3899> of his bread לַדָּֽל׃ <WH1800> to the poor

גָּ֣רֵֽשׁ <WH1644> Cast out לֵ֭ץ <WH3887> the scorner וְיֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> shall go out מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> and contention וְ֝יִשְׁבֹּ֗ת <WH7673> shall cease דִּ֣ין <WH1779> yea strife וְקָלֽוֹן׃ <WH7036> and reproach

אֹהֵ֥ב <WH157> He that loveth [טְהֹור־ כ] (טְהָר־ <WH2889> clean לֵ֑ב <WH2890> pureness ק) חֵ֥ן <WH2580> [for] the grace שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> of his lips רֵעֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> [shall be] his friend מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> The eyes יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD נָ֣צְרוּ <WH5341> preserve דָ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וַ֝יְסַלֵּ֗ף <WH5557> and he overthroweth דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words בֹגֵֽד׃ <WH898> of the transgressor

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> [man] saith עָ֭צֵל <WH6102> The slothful אֲרִ֣י <WH738> [There is] a lion בַח֑וּץ <WH2351> without בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in רְ֝חֹב֗וֹת <WH7339> the streets אֵֽרָצֵֽחַ׃ <WH7523> I shall be slain

שׁוּחָ֣ה <WH7745> pit עֲ֭מֻקָּה <WH6013> [is] a deep פִּ֣י <WH6310> The mouth זָר֑וֹת <WH2114> of strange women זְע֥וּם <WH2194> he that is abhorred יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD [יִפֹּול־ כ] (יִפָּל־ <WH5307> will fall שָֽׁם׃ <WH5307> shall fall ק)

אִ֭וֶּלֶת <WH200> Foolishness קְשׁוּרָ֣ה <WH7194> [is] bound בְלֶב־ <WH3820> in the heart נָ֑עַר <WH5288> of a child שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> [but] the rod מ֝וּסָ֗ר <WH4148> of correction יַרְחִיקֶ֥נָּה <WH7368> shall drive it far מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> who

עֹ֣שֵֽׁק <WH6231> He that oppresseth דָּ֭ל <WH1800> the poor לְהַרְבּ֣וֹת <WH7235> to increase ל֑וֹ נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> his [riches and] he that giveth לְ֝עָשִׁ֗יר <WH6223> to the rich אַךְ־ <WH389> only לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <WH4270> [shall] surely [come] to want

הַ֥ט <WH5186> Bow down אָזְנְךָ֗ <WH241> thine ear וּ֭שְׁמַע <WH8085> and hear דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words חֲכָמִ֑ים <WH2450> of the wise וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <WH3820> thine heart תָּשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> and apply לְדַעְתִּֽי׃ <WH1847> unto my knowledge

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if נָ֭עִים <WH5273> For [it is] a pleasant thing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תִשְׁמְרֵ֣ם <WH8104> if thou keep בְּבִטְנֶ֑ךָ <WH990> them within יִכֹּ֥נוּ <WH3559> be fitted יַ֝חְדָּ֗ו <WH3162> thee they shall withal עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפָתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8193> in thy lips

לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> may be in בַּ֭יהוָה <WH3068> may be in the LORD מִבְטַחֶ֑ךָ <WH4009> That thy trust הוֹדַעְתִּ֖יךָ <WH3045> I have made known הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> to thee this day אַף־ <WH637> even אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you
הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not כָתַ֣בְתִּי <WH3789> Have not I written לְ֭ךָ [שִׁלְשֹׁום כ] (שָׁלִישִׁ֑ים <WH8032> before that time ק) בְּמ֖וֹעֵצֹ֣ת <WH4156> in counsels וָדָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> and knowledge

לְהוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֗ <WH3045> That I might make thee know קֹ֭שְׁטְ <WH7189> the certainty אִמְרֵ֣י <WH561> of the words אֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> of truth לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> that thou mightest answer אֲמָרִ֥ים <WH561> the words אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <WH571> of truth לְשֹׁלְחֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7971> to them that send פ אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תִּגְזָל־ <WH1497> catch

דָּ֭ל <WH1800> not the poor כִּ֣י <WH3588> because דַל־ <WH1800> because he [is] poor ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְאַל־ <WH408> not תְּדַכֵּ֖א <WH1792> neither oppress עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the afflicted בַשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> in the gate

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God יָרִ֣יב <WH7378> will plead רִיבָ֑ם <WH7379> their cause וְקָבַ֖ע <WH6906> and spoil אֶת־ <WH853> קֹבְעֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6906> of those that spoiled נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> the soul

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭תְרַע <WH7462> Make no friendship אֶת־ <WH854> with בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> man אָ֑ף <WH639> with an angry וְאֶת־ <WH854> for אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man חֵ֝מוֹת <WH2534> and with a furious לֹ֣א <WH3808> Or תָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> thou shalt not go
פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or תֶּאֱלַ֥ף <WH502> Lest thou learn [אָרְחָתֹו כ] (אֹֽרְחֹתָ֑יו <WH734> manner ק) וְלָקַחְתָּ֖ <WH3947> and get מוֹקֵ֣שׁ <WH4170> a snare לְנַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> to thy soul

אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become בְתֹֽקְעֵי־ <WH8628> Be not thou [one] of them that strike כָ֑ף <WH3709> hands בַּ֝עֹרְבִ֗ים <WH6148> [or] of them that are sureties מַשָּׁאֽוֹת׃ <WH4859> for debts אִם־ <WH518> lo אֵֽין־ <WH369> else
לְךָ֥ לְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> If thou hast nothing to pay לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> why should he take away מִ֝שְׁכָּבְךָ֗ <WH4904> thy bed מִתַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH8478> under
אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּ֭סֵּג <WH5253> Remove גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> landmark עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> not the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> Which עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> have set אֲבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> which thy fathers

חָזִ֡יתָ <WH2372> Seest אִ֤ישׁ ׀ <WH376> thou a man מָ֘הִ֤יר <WH4106> diligent בִּמְלַאכְתּ֗וֹ <WH4399> business לִֽפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> before מְלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> kings יִתְיַצָּ֑ב <WH3320> he shall not stand בַּל־ <WH1077> He will not יִ֝תְיַצֵּב <WH3320> stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before חֲשֻׁכִּֽים׃ <WH2823> mean פ
